revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Flextronics |model=MWS1000 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/03/2009 |manuf_country= |manuf=Celeno |manuf_model=VXT1025 |manuf_rev=(WAP-5831) |availability= |type=bridge |fcc_id=XQOMWS-1000 |ic_id=5248U-MWS1000 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT2880 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S281632K |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2850 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=an |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0B:8C |oui_eth=00:0B:8C }} "Celeno Wireless Communications", "Patent Pending Celeno Proprietary", "CELENO CLIENT" and "P/N BOARD: PCB00021" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The test report specifies additional models of VXT1025 and WAP-5831.
This device is presumed to use RT2850.
[http://www.comtrend.com/cgi-bin/db-search.cgi?template=News&dbname=product&key2=100&action=searchdbdisplay Sold by '''Comtrend''' as a Wireless Video Adapter.] :[http://www.engadget.com/topics/hd/2009/03/23/comtrends-wireless-video-adapters-based-on-celeno-hd-wifi-chip/ On '''Engadget''']
The FCC manual states the default IP is 10.0.0.10.
